SEARCH
Package KI306.Yarmola.Lab3

Class ElectricTrain

java.lang.Object
KI306.Yarmola.Lab3.Locomotive
KI306.Yarmola.Lab3.ElectricTrain
All Implemented Interfaces:
TrainInterface
public class ElectricTrain extends Locomotive implements TrainInterface
The ElectricTrain class represents an electric train, which is a type of locomotive implementing the TrainInterface. It extends the Locomotive class and adds specific functionality for an electric train, including control of train doors, lights, and temperature.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yura Yarmola

  • Constructor Details

    • ElectricTrain

      public ElectricTrain() throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor for an electric train. Initializes the train with default values.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown when "Log.txt" file is not found.

    • ElectricTrain

      public ElectricTrain(boolean open, boolean light, int car_number) throws FileNotFoundException
      Parameterized constructor for an electric train.
      Parameters:
      open - Specifies if the train door is initially open.
      light - Specifies if the train light is initially on.
      car_number - The initial number of train cars.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown when "Log.txt" file is not found.
